flawed_nl_solution:
His speed means he can do 10/100=<<10/100=0.01>>0.01 minute per piece
So he can finish 1 puzzle in 2000*0.01=<<2000*0.01=20>>20 minutes
So these two puzzles take 20*2=<<20*2=40>>40 minutes
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.1, not 0.01. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
